name: Hunger Souls
description:
Hunger Souls is a first person shooter game.  Survive from zombies and escape the area.  A headshot will kill a zombie immediately. There's ammunition and med packs in various places in the map which player  can acquire.

Touching water will reduce player's health.

Controls

Move ForwardWMove Backward
SMove Left AMove RightDJump SpaceRunShiftFire Mouse LeftAimMouse RightWeapon ChangeMouse WheelReload RQuick change to AxeF
